repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body: This PR adds the C++ STL [cmath header](https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/header/cmath). It's mainly motivated by the new C++17 mathematical special functions (like `assoc_laguerre`, `assoc_legendre`, `beta`, ...) and the C++20 linear interpolation function `lerp`. However, all other functions are already in libc.math, so I'm not really sure if we should have them in both libc.math and libcpp.cmath.

comment_data.body:
EOL missing
```suggestion
    return hypot(x, y, z)
```
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+# mode: run
+# tag: cpp, werror, cpp17
+
+from libcpp.cmath cimport beta, legendre, hypot
+
+def test_beta(double x, double y):
+    """
+    Test C++17 std::beta function
+    >>> test_beta(1.0, 1.0)
+    1.0
+    >>> test_beta(1.0, 2.0)
+    0.5
+    """
+    return beta(x, y)
+
+def test_legendre(int x, double y):
+    """
+    Test C++17 std::legendre function
+    >>> test_legendre(1, 2.0)
+    2.0
+    >>> test_legendre(2, 3.0)
+    13.0
+    """
+    return legendre(x, y)
+
+def test_hypot(double x, double y, double z):
+    """
+    Test C++17 std::hypot function
+    >>> test_hypot(1.0, 2.0, 2.0)
+    3.0
+    >>> test_hypot(3.0, 4.0, 0.0)
+    5.0
+    """
+    return hypot(x, y, z)

@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+# mode: run
+# tag: cpp, werror, cpp20
+
+from libcpp.cmath cimport lerp
+
+def test_lerp(double a, double b, double t):
+    """ Test C++20 std::lerp function
+    >>> test_lerp(1.0, 2.0, 0.5)
+    1.5
+    >>> test_lerp(1.0, 4.0, 0.5)
+    2.5
+    """
+    return lerp(a, b, t)

comment_data.body: If `std::beta()` is the issue here, then could you use a different function in this test? Then we could at least enable the C++17 tests on macOS.

I double-checked it on my Mac and it turned out Apple Clang doesn't support the C++17 mathematical special functions yet (apart from the trivial `hypot` function), see [here](https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/compiler_support/17). :/
Not just apple clang, but clang itself. It's not around the corner [either](https://reviews.llvm.org/D142806).

comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,35 @@
+# mode: run
+# tag: cpp, werror, cpp17
+
+from libcpp.cmath cimport beta, legendre, hypot
+
+def test_beta(double x, double y):
+    """
+    Test C++17 std::beta function
+    >>> test_beta(1.0, 1.0)
+    1.0
+    >>> test_beta(1.0, 2.0)
+    0.5
+    """
+    return beta(x, y)
+
+def test_legendre(int x, double y):
+    """
+    Test C++17 std::legendre function
+    >>> test_legendre(1, 2.0)
+    2.0
+    >>> test_legendre(2, 3.0)
+    13.0
+    """
+    return legendre(x, y)
+
+def test_hypot(double x, double y, double z):
+    """
+    Test C++17 std::hypot function
+    >>> test_hypot(1.0, 2.0, 2.0)
+    3.0
+    >>> test_hypot(3.0, 4.0, 0.0)
+    5.0
+    """
+    return hypot(x, y, z)
+

commit.message: Apple Clang 14 doesn't support std::beta yet -_-
